Title: Enacts the "keep kids covered act" to provide automatic continuous enrollment in medical assistance and child health plus for certain children through age five
Summary: Requires automatic continuous enrollment in medical assistance and child health plus for previously eligible children through age five.
LawCode: Amd §§366-h & 366, Soc Serv L; amd §2511, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the public health law, in relation to automatic continuous enrollment in medical assistance and the child health insurance plan for children through age five
